name: Chilukuri Shashank
about:
I am a Final-year Computer Science student with a CGPA of 9.3, capable of building web applications, REST APIs, and real-time features using JavaScript, React, Node.js, MySQL, and MongoDB.

I focus on backend development, database modeling, and writing clean, maintainable code. I have experience in building production-ready applications and have completed a Data Engineering Internship at Wipro, working with Microsoft Fabric and Databricks.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.description: Full-stack URL shortening service with modular backend, authentication, and analytics.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: Scalable real-time chat system with event-driven architecture and low-latency communication.

projects.title: Word Search Tool
projects.description: Responsive word search utility with dictionary API integration, history, and caching.

projects.title: AskByDoc
projects.description: AI RAG chatbot for uploading PDFs and receiving context-aware answers.

projects.title: AI Interview Assistant
projects.description: Mock interview platform using Gemini API for automated evaluation.

projects.title: Feedback Analyzer
projects.description: Sentiment and tone analysis tool classifying user feedback using transformer models and Gemini API.

projects.title: Satellite Image Segmentation
projects.description: U-Net based system for identifying map features from satellite imagery.

experience.description: Working on Python-based data engineering pipelines, workflow automation, and building dashboards using Databricks. Collaborating on scalable data solutions using Microsoft Fabric and optimizing SQL queries.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
